content:
During the last day, 67 combat clashes took place. In total, during the last day, the enemy caused 5 missile and 74 aircraft strikes, and made 152 shelling of rocket launchers on the positions of our troops and settlements.

About thisreportedThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

In Kupyansk directionThe enemy made 1 unsuccessful attack on the position of our troops in the area of the settlement of Ivanivka of Kharkiv region.

In the estuary directionOur warriors repelled 13 enemy attacks in the areas of the settlements of Bigorivka of Luhansk region; Tern, Yampolivka, and north of the Merry Donetsk region, where the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried to break through the defense of our troops.

In the Bakhmut direction7 attacks of the enemy in the area of settlements Ivanivske, Bogdanivka, Klyshchiyivka of Donetsk region are reflected.

In the Avdiivsky directionOur defenders repelled 9 enemy attacks in the areas of settlements of Berdychi, Semenivka, Nevel and Pervomaisk Donetsk region.

In the Novopavlovsky directionThe forces of defense continue to restrain the enemy in the areas of settlements Novomykhailivka, St. George, Urozhizhne, where the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried 26 times to break through the defense of our troops.

In Orikhiv direction the enemyWith the support of aviation, 7 times attacked the positions of our defenders in the areas of Staromayorsky Donetsk region; Robots and northwestern willow Zaporizhzhya region.

In the Kherson direction the enemyIt does not refuse to knock out our units from the bridges on the Dnieper Left Bank. During the last day, he made 3 unsuccessful attacks on the positions of our troops in the area of Krynka settlement of Kherson region.
title: 26 attacks were reflected in the Novopavlovsky direction, 67 municipalities took place on the front in the front
